you need nvidia-source and (possibly) module-assistant
do i have to recompile? with those sources
and where do i put them?>
i think so... the problem is the nvidia-driver. the kernel expects it, but it's not guaranteed that it will build against 2.6.30....
ah, ok, but where do i get those sources from?
nvidia-driver == closed source ... only the 'adapter' is build from source
yes, unless i choose open source driver :(. where do i get the 'adaptor' from?
i have not fully investigated the problem, but your kernel build was succesful in general, you only have to deal with the nvidia specialities
so where do i get it from...
the 'adapter' is the nvidia.ko which adapts the nvidia driver blob (binary large object) to the kernel. When you build the 'driver' you actually only build the adapter
